name: key-master
description: hashmap + constructor function = a hashmap you don't have to check before calling get()

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run compile && npm test
scripts.test: npx tslint --project . && npx tsc --project tsconfig-tests.json && tape test.js && jsmd readme.md
scripts.publish-package: git push && git push --tags && npm run build && npm publish --access=public --ignore-scripts dist

author: TehShrike
